Posted By: steve

Posted By: Jim VB
Unfortunately, Steve, EVERY time you post and try to use this board, either to sell, or to solicit info from it's members, IT IS CALLED FOR!

Many of the people on this (and the Non-sports) board, consider themselves friends. They are actually pretty close. When you have cheated, tried to cheat, or shilled one of them, others take it as a personal offense. 

If you don't like that, I suggest you make amends with those you have wronged. I realize that multiple Ebay names, and fake shill bidders will make that a difficult job. But until then, each time you come on here and try to sell, expect a response from someone.

Posted By: steve
need to get your facts straight. i admitted to shilling back about a year ago because i didnt know it was against rules since then i have done no such thing (dont always believe everything you read). as for the other 2 accounts they are inactive and have not been used, nor will they be used. i tried to combine the accounts but apparently ebay does not allow that anymore.

with that being said, if you dont like anything i say or post, then ignore it. because i have actually done successful deals from the b/s/t forum.

Posted By: Jim VB
My facts are pretty straight. There's a 200+ post thread on the non-sports board detailing many of your problems. There are a few threads on the main board here, with the same kind of info. 



You used to shill, but now you don't? 



You used to have multiple ebay names, but now you don't? 



You used to take money and not ship the goods, but now...?









I won't ignore your attempts to use this board to swindle board members. I'm sure you've done some good deals, but you've also done some bad ones. Expect that each time you post something to sell, I will either post a warning, or I'll email the potential buyer. 



Guess you should have settled with Mark Finn over a year ago, shouldn't you?
